title: Simulation-Based Mathematical Learning Design Expression Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary school-level mathematics knowledge and over 3 years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design methodology learning for enhancing mathematical problem-solving competencies in VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners visually represent the structural flow of simulation-based mathematics courses using course architecture diagrams
Learners can appropriately place at least three types of interactive digital icons (videos, quizzes, etc.) applicable in VR environments
Learners can revise and improve their design proposals at least twice based on peer assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
